department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Bid call for toilet paper and hand paper towels
description: Procurement for toilet paper and hand paper towels for CSC
full_summary:
Title | Description
---------|---------
**Government Tender Announcement**
 | This is a formal request for proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of toilet paper and hand paper towels for Correctional Services Canada (CSC) facilities located in Quebec.

### Tender Details

* Reference Number: [WS4265491044](#reference-number)
* Solicitation Number: [WS4265491044](#solicitation-number)
* Publication Date: December 1, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 22, 2023, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: December 13, 2024

### Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services - Demand (DS)
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer (RSO)
* Procurement Method: Open bidding - Competitive
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is covered by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

### Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PSPC) at [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Additional Resources
